import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { hideBottomMenuPostIcon } from '../../config/utils' import Header from '../../components/fixed/Header' import SettingsMenu from './components/SettingsMenu' import BlockedProfiles from './components/BlockedProfiles' import ChangePassword from './components/ChangePassword' import DeleteAccount from './components/DeleteAccount' export default function Settings(props) { if (!props.page) props.page = 'blocked-profiles' document.title = 'Configurações / Napker' useEffect(() => { hideBottomMenuPostIcon() document.getElementById(props.page).classList.add('active') }, []) const pageChange = page => { document.querySelectorAll('.active').forEach(el => { el.classList.remove('active') }) document.getElementById(page).classList.add('active') } return ( <>
{props.page === 'blocked-profiles' ? : <> {props.page === 'change-password' ? : } }
) }
